channel.title: Learnings on Colin Spear
channel.description: Recent content in Learnings on Colin Spear

item.description: Booming real estate prices Why are prices going up all across the country / continent? How is Vancouver both typical and atypical in this dynamic?
Learning building mental models of everything information theory + Claude Shannon money

addiction Questions What is addiction? Is it measures by our actions? Our desires? What sorts of things are addictive? What are the consequences of addiction? Who gets addicted? Do we all have addictions to something? What do we do about addiction? How do we engage and interact with it both within ourselves and in our families, communities, countries and the world Resources Never Enough by Judith Grisel

I’m still trying to figure out how to organize the Learning section of the website. Please let me know if you have any ideas or suggestions! Things I want to learn more about Addiction Vocation and work Computer science and programming Tools for thought and how to learn better The cost of housing. Why does it seem to be going up everywhere?

Causal inference Causal Inference: The Mixtape Similar to Mostly Harmless Econometrics, perhaps a bit more accessible plus a chapter on DAGs The Effect I’m mostly interested in reading Part I on Research Design Cyrus Samii course Recommended by Sean Taylor via Twitter
